description:
Luffy pushes his body to the breaking point in his battle with Lucci, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to fight off a fleet of Marines until their captain returns - if he ever does.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En attendant Luffy ! Combat mortel sur le pont de l`hésitation
Luffy o Mate! Tamerai no Hashi no Shitou!
Wait for Luffy! Mortal Combat on the Bridge of Hesitation!
Дождаться Луффи! Бой на Мосту Сомнений!
ルフィを待て! ためらいの橋の死闘!
